channel.title: Obamination
channel.description:
Barak Obama sucks. There are so many bastards wandering around in that disgusting swamp called Washington these days, it seems mean to pick just one out, but this Obama guy sinks below the crowd. Compared to George Bush, the semi-retarded son of an oil-tycoon, trained to be a professional shit shoveller, Obama is the fucking anti-christ. He lies with such style and grace and freedom and he's so fluid and charming, he seems to pluck the bullshit out of thin air, just like it's real truth! Fuck him and fuck the government.
Obama has ridden to power on the same social currents that radicals have relied on to propel their organizing and outreach over the past eight years: disgust with the excesses of empire, longing for more fairness and sociability in daily life, optimism about vague alternatives. It is no coincidence that the liberal anti-war movement died out just as the presidential campaigns got underway; the race effectively subsumed the energy of all not explicitly critical of representative democracy. This cooptation of popular momentum is as essential to the disempowerment of the populace as the brutal repression associated with the right wing. The powers that be are equally willing to tear gas us or hire us to go door to door registering voters—whatever it takes to keep us from building our own power outside and against their structures. In that regard, Obama’s election marks a new phase of their efforts to keep their system viable—calculated to defuse discontent, further marginalize radicals, and maintain the essential power imbalances of our society while giving the institutions that perpetuate them a makeover.
http://news.infoshop.org/article.php?story=2008crimethinc-obama-course

item.title: Obamination
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

PALIN IS A HOT MILF!!!

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:72, topic:251170”][quote author=OnlyOneRule link=topic=331453.msg2597955#msg2597955 date=1230077766]
Why are Americans always looking for a government conspiracy? Lol, everything is a lie isn’t it. Just like Aliens. Your governemt isn’t telling you anything about them and all you ever do is beg them for information and accuse them of things they know nothing about, but yet they wont give you any information. Well want to know why?

BECAUSE ALIENS DON’T FUCKING EXIST!

Face it. There is nothing wrong with Obama. Everything the government will do, will only be done with good meanings for your country. Learn to live with it.
[/quote]
How do you explain why they keep that so secret?
If there was no Aliens, there would be nothing to hide.[/quote]

After WWII, and during the cold war, the CIA, KGB and the Mossad did a shit load of crazy experiments. Some involve genetically modifying humans.

Read full topic

item.title: Obamination
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“King Redrum, post:67, topic:251170”]I dislike Obama and because I do, I’ve been called a racist more times in the last few months than I have ever been in my entire life.

Banning guns? Might I ask you, what is the point? The outlaws are not going to turn them in, meaning they will have the upper hand on actual citizens, seeing as we won’t have guns, but they will.

Another thing, I didn’t want Obama to win and I didn’t want bloody McCain to win either. I wanted Clinton to win.

And as I also read in here, the ONLY DAMN reason Obama won is because all of the black people that have never voted before in their LIFE went out and voted for him, simply because he’s black.

Either way, with McCain or Obama, the country was still going to go to hell in a hand basket, I for one, would have preferred it went to hell in a hand basket with someone who didn’t give us shit and lied so much that you could cut it with a knife.[/quote]
Clinton was in the election…?

Read full topic

Either way, with McCain or Obama, the country was still going to go to hell in a hand basket, I for one, would have preferred it went to hell in a hand basket with someone who didn’t give us shit and lied so much that you could cut it with a knife.

item.title: Obamination
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:57, topic:251170”]In the Netherlands we use the following system:
income tax
1 € 0 - € 17.579 33,60%
2 to € 31.589 41,85%
3 to € 53.860 42,00%
4 more then € 53.860 52,00%

So someone who earns 120.000 pays the following
33.60% of € 17.579
41,85% of € 31.589
42% of € 53.860
52% of € 16.972

I bet you Swedes pay more taxes then us. And we already pay a shitload.[/quote]Holy shit, that’s more than us.

  1. 27 383–40 716 SEK you pay 20%
  2. Over 40 716 SEK you pay 25%

Read full topic

item.title: Obamination
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

In the Netherlands we use the following system:
income tax
1 € 0 - € 17.579 33,60%
2 to € 31.589 41,85%
3 to € 53.860 42,00%
4 more then € 53.860 52,00%

So someone who earns 120.000 pays the following
33.60% of € 17.579
41,85% of € 31.589
42% of € 53.860
52% of € 16.972

I bet you Swedes pay more taxes then us. And we already pay a shitload.

Edit: Ske, if my plans come true, I’ll become a CEO. You need an education for that, no matter what you say.
Edit 2: I chose my own education, I doubt that is something a brainless person would do.

Read full topic

item.title: Obamination
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:49, topic:251170”][quote author=Ske link=topic=331453.msg2593166#msg2593166 date=1229871773]

I agree, but the chance of getting a good job increases drastically.

Some people are born ‘stupid’, yes. But many who have a job that you’d think a retard wouldn’t do, didn’t do jackshit when they were young. They thought it was cool to fuck over the teachers, or not going to school at all. Those fuckheads don’t deserve to whine.

Then there is a group that really is stupid. But there are jobs for people that are stupid. And if they have the will, they can even start their own company in the branch they work in.

‘Stupid’ people don’t expect to much quality in their lives, so they don’t have to spend much either. But somehow they have the urge to do so, and they get poor.

You’re just one of those kids who doesn’t do anything else than do what he is told to.
Think and act with your brain for once and stop listening to what other people say.
Education is not neccesary to have a wealthy life.
[/quote]

I’m one of those kids that respects his parents for paying for his education. I’m one of those kids who thinks about his future, and not just about today.

So tell me, how do you plan on having a wealthy life in a country where you need a certificate to start a business, without an education?[/quote]
I need to attend a class for 5 days and pass the exams to get a cerificate for starting a business.
So that’s no problem.
I think more about my future than you do. In fact, i think too much about my future.
If you like studying what is given you to study, do what you’re told to do, and when you graduate work on whatever is told to you to work on, then thats fine.Go ahead and live a brainless life.

employees are the sheep. Employers are the shepherds.
I dont want to live my life like a sheep.

Now that’s just my opinion, most will disagree, but thats just my view of life.

Read full topic

item.title: Obamination
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:54, topic:251170”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=331453.msg2593215#msg2593215 date=1229872704]

I’m lucky my parents pay for it. But if they didn’t I’d still get the education. Why? If they would pay it, it would mean they couldn’t. In our country the government pays for education if the parents can’t.

If the government didn’t, I’d get a job and pay for the education myself.
[/quote]Or you move to a real country where education is free.

Tell me, how does your government pay for the education?[/quote]Tax money. And no, we don’t have particularily high taxes.

Read full topic
